metadata.title: Captain Canvas - Your Automatic Layout Tool
metadata.description: Save time and optimize your workflow with automatic image layout and mural creation.

hero.h1: Captain Canvas - Your Automatic Layout Tool
hero.description: Save time and space on your print canvases by optimally organizing all your elements.

features.description1: Make the most of your print sheet space using an efficient algorithm to position images.
features.description2: You can add more copies of an image. It will be useful if you want to fill the space with small elements.
features.description3: Export your canvases to JPG or PDF. You can also embed the sRGB color profile.
features.description6: The app runs on your computer. No data is sent to any server.

download.title: Download the App
download.description: Get the latest version of our desktop application.
download.description2: Without a license, you can only preview the result.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have a question? Want to report a bug? Want to suggest a new feature?
contact.name: Name
